name: Lycanthrope, Wereotter
damage_immunities: nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with silvered weapons
senses: darkvision 60' (otter & hybrid forms only), passive Perception 14

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Javelin attacks or one Bite attack and two Javelins. It can replace one Javelin with Net.

actions.name: Bite (Otter or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid is cursed with wereotter lycanthropy (DC 11 Con negates curse).

actions.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/120' one target 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Net (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 5/15 ft. one target Large or smaller creature hit by net is restrained until freed. Net has no effect on creatures that are formless or Huge or larger. Creature including target can use action to free restrained target via DC 11 Str check. Dealing 5 slashing to net (AC 10) frees target with o harming it ending effect and destroying net.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into a Med otter-humanoid hybrid or into Large otter or back into true form: Humanoid. Stats other than size are same in each form. Items worn/ carried not transformed. Reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 10 min.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
